Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComponentFrame
    this Frame provides a utility class for displaying a single Component in a Frame.
    copier
    copier will copy a specified number of messages from one folder to another folder. it demonstrates how to use the JavaMail APIs to copy messages.
    CRLFOutputStream
    Convert lines into the canonical MIME format, that is, terminate lines with CRLF.
    FileErrorManager
    An error manager used to store mime messages from the MailHandler to the file system when the email server is unavailable or unreachable.
    folderlist
    Demo app that exercises the Message interfaces.
    FolderModel
    Maps the messages in a Folder to the Swing's Table Model
    FolderTreeNode
    Node which represents a Folder in the javax.mail apis.
    FolderViewer  
    JavaMailServlet
    This is a servlet that demonstrates the use of JavaMail APIs in a 3-tier application.
    MailHandlerDemo
    Demo for the different configurations for the MailHandler.
    MessageViewer  
    monitor  
    mover  
    MSBodyPart
    A special MimeBodyPart used with MSMessage.
    msgmultisendsample
    msgmultisendsample creates a simple multipart/mixed message and sends it.
    msgsend
    Demo app that shows how to construct and send an RFC822 (singlepart) message.
    msgsendsample
    msgsendsample creates a very simple text/plain message and sends it.
    msgshow  
    MSMessage
    This class models a UUEncoded Message sent from MS Outlook etc.
    MSMultipartDataSource
    A special MultipartDataSource used with MSMessage.
    MultipartViewer
    A Viewer Bean for the type multipart/mixed
    namespace  
    NewlineOutputStream
    Convert the various newline conventions to the local platform's newline convention.
    populate  
    registry
    This class demonstrates how to query the registry for available Providers, set default providers, etc.
    search  
    sendfile
    sendfile will create a multipart message with the second block of the message being the given file.
    sendhtml
    Demo app that shows how to construct and send a single part html message.
    SimpleAuthenticator
    Simple Authenticator for requesting password information.
    SimpleClient
    Demo app that shows a very simple Mail Client
    smtpsend
    Demo app that shows how to construct and send an RFC822 (singlepart) message.
    StoreTreeNode
    Node which represents a Store in the javax.mail apis.
    SummaryFormatter
    A compact formatter used to summarize an error report.
    SummaryNameFormatter
    Creates an attachment name based on the number of records and errors.
    TextViewer
    A very simple TextViewer Bean for the MIMEType "text/plain"
    transport
    transport is a simple program that creates a message, explicitly retrieves a Transport from the session based on the type of the address (it's InternetAddress, so SMTP will be used) and sends the message.
    uidmsgshow
